title: PRD ReDesign: OTC Homepage - Online Pharmacy Home
background: OTC (Over-the-Counter) was defined as part of the company's strategic goals to grow the non-prescription category, attract new customers, and later convert them into prescription (RX) and cannabis customers. Today, there is no official OTC homepage that motivates users to purchase.
current_issues: Hard for users to navigate to the right product
Basket building is not optimized for convenience
solution: The new OTC Homepage will make navigation simple, highlighting offers, and making the basket flow feel like a familiar e-commerce experience.

characteristics: Arrive without a specific product in mind
Need help navigating categories, applying filters, and discovering new products
Expect clear discounts, shipping policies, and trustworthy reviews

problem_statements: Users can't easily find specific products by name or category
Lack of quick filters (category, brand, price) slows product discovery
Discounts and promotions are not clearly displayed
Shipping times, payment options, cancellation policies are not visible upfront
Cart abandonment is high, checkout flow doesn't feel rewarding
success_metrics: +20% conversion improvement (page view → paid order in 24h)

design_sections.requirements: 1) Logo + My Account + E-Prescription button, 2) CRM coupon code bar, 3) Search bar + hamburger menu
One-line carousel of category circles (image + category name). 10 OTC categories.
design_sections.notes: Each category image must clearly represent its category

design_sections.requirements: Mobile: carousel of 3 banners. Desktop: 2 small static banners + 1 large auto-rotating carousel (3 banners).
design_sections.notes: Must have CTA button or arrow indicating clickability

design_sections.requirements: 4 colored, icon-based USPs: Delivered in 1-2 days, Original and certified, Save time and money, Discreet service
Carousel of promotional products selected by Stock team. Each card includes discount tag, product image, name, price (current + old + %), CTA. Button: 'See all Sale'
Carousel of OTC product brands with clickable logos. Must use high-quality images/logos.

design_sections.section: Top Categories – Favorites of the Month
design_sections.requirements: Each category block = image + category name. 10 categories listed. Product carousel inside each category with mobile: 2 products visible + peek of 3rd
5 site-wide FAQs in accordion, 1 open by default
Company footer with: Logo, Accordion navigation links, Payment methods, Country flags, Company address, Certifications, © 2025 DoktorABC

development_requirements.description: Sticky top bar with: Logo, Search field, E-prescription button, Cart icon (with badge), My Account, Main menu. Remains fixed on scroll.
Opens existing cart drawer with same data & functions as today. New line: 'Total saving' appears only if cart contains discounted items.
Banners fetched from Back Office and displayed as image with CTA label + link. Admin can add/update/delete banners. If no banners exist, section is hidden. Auto-rotate every 3-4 seconds.
When user types, autosuggest/results show OTC products only using same search logic as current homepage search, filtered to OTC and by country.
If user focuses search with empty input, open search panel with: OTC categories strip, 12 products on sale, Brand strip
Render OTC-specific CRM coupon strip. Content managed by CRM; component is reusable.
Horizontal strip showing all OTC categories from DB with image. Clicking opens that category page.
Show carousel with all OTC brands from DB. Clicking a brand navigates to Brand page.
Auto-rotates 4 banners. Pause on hover (desktop); respect prefers-reduced-motion. Banners managed via CMS.
Show 4 USPs. 'Free shipping over $X' shown only if DB value X > 0; otherwise hide it and center other three.

search_bar_states.empty_click: Show all categories, 12 recommended promo products, brands bar
search_bar_states.no_results: Display 'No products found' message, suggest alternative categories and promo products
